text_block_list.text: That was when I first met that Uma Musume―― On a cloudy day on that tree-lined street.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm, looks like today……I won't be able to see it.
She seemed to be looking in to the sky, looking for something. She almost felt ephemeral, but she still left an impression――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Yes!? Ah, I'm sorry! I was blocking the middle of the road, wasn't I?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Ah, that badge…… You're a trainer, aren't you!? We're always in your care♪
In our care? Does that mean……?
choice_data_list: Do you already have a trainer?
Do you already have a trainer?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Well, I……don't have one yet. Because――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I can't really run!
――An Uma Musume that can't run. I don't know the reason, but she……was saying a rather negative thing with a bright smile on her face.
――Several days later. There was a Mock race being held at Tracen Academy. And participating in it were……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ha, Brian! It's been a while since our last contest, huh? I've been waiting for this moment! It's a showdown!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmmm, so you're aiming for me, Ama-san. See if you can fulfill even a little of――this desire of mine.
――A clash between dragon and tiger. They had not debuted yet, but they were considered part of the strongest class. The unparalleled "Narita Brian" and the dorm leader "Hishi Amazon".
The raceground was crowded with a large number of spectators due to this outstanding matchup……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Waah~, I wonder who will win? Brian-chan and Hishi Ama-chan are both really fast and strong!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Ah! You're that trainer from before……! Hey, which one do you think will win?
In the audience was that Uma Musume I met before on that tree-lined street. The Uma Musume who "can't run".
The excitement of the crowd reached its peak. The curtain rose on a fierce competition with many spectators.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huuu……!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Kuu――!? Just by putting in a little effort you can pull this far ahead!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: I won't lose! I won't let you beat me!! Oooooooooooh!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Not enough……this isn't enough……to satisfy my desire……

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: More……I need more……! Haaa……!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Brian-chan……is amazing……
The result was Narita Brian's victory. Hishi Amazon desperately tried to hang on……but ultimately ended somewhat behind in 2nd place.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ah, damnit!! To think you'd pull that far ahead!! Heh, trying to show that I'm not a worthy opponent, huh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ――That's not the case. Right now, the only one that can even slightly fulfill my desire is you, Ama-san.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Haha, slightly, huh? I don't know whether to be happy or pissed. Is there nobody besides me that can fufill that desire?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ……There isn't.
Certainly――she was overwhelming. Narita Brian walked away from the turf, but with a certain air of emptiness……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Congratulations, Brian-chan!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah.
She left after just a quick glance. I doubted she even recognized the Uma Musume who spoke to her.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: She's amazing, isn't she!? Brian-chan. By just putting in a little effort, she's able to pull away that far……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: And from now on, to think she's going to get even stronger……she won't lose to anyone! Being able to run like that, she's really amazing, isn't she?
That was the gaze of someone that was star-struck. It was almost like she was……
I couldn't help but ask. Was this Uma Musume who couldn't run entrusting her dreams to Narita Brian?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Fan……? I wouldn't say I'm a fan. Just cheering for her feels kind of distant. I am――
What was she going to say? "Aspiration" "Goal" "Acquaintance". Several words came to mind. but, the words she chose……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I am――the Uma Musume who will win against that unbeatable Brian-chan!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: ……Laurel. I'm Sakura Laurel♪
――With those words, a breeze blew past. And a single cherry blossom petal swirled around me.
